content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)).

### Copper plate mine at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)) with no ingredients to smelt.

### Copper cable factory
No factory has been built yet.

### Water supply system
Consists of an offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)) and a pipe group (fluid system 3110) with pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -33.5), and (109.5, -31.5).

### Steam supply system
Consists of a boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)) and a pipe group (fluid system 3114) with pipes at positions (117.5, -34.5), (118.5, -34.5), (119.5, -34.5), and others.

### Electricity distribution system
Consists of an electricity group (id 159) with a pole at position (119.5, -30.5) and voltage 0.

### Transport system
Consists of two belts: one from (63.5, -52.5) to (63.5, -54.5) and another from (64.5, -52.5) to (64.5, -54.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Make sure you have the item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into an entity.
- Check if the entity has enough space to hold the item.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is placed in a valid position to pump water.
- Check if the pipe connections are correct and not blocked.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to operate.
- Check if the steam output point is correctly connected to a pipe.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine has a valid input liquid (steam) and output connection.
- Check if the pipe connections are correct and not blocked.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
Important variables:
- `transport-belt`: 8
- `small-electric-pole`: 1
- `wood`: 7
- `iron-ore`: 10
- `copper-ore`: 10
- `iron-plate`: 7
- `copper-plate`: 5
- `copper-cable`: 2
- `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
